ST JOHN’S, 5th JULY, 1910.
ABSTRACTS
OF

ABSTRACTS OF ACTS OF TYNWALD
THE GAME ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS GURNEILYS YNNYDAGH (THIEYN-LHEIYS) NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: THE object and purport of this Act are to prevent the use of artificial lights of any description in connection with the shooting of game, rabbits, birds, or vermin.
Manx: TA’N aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiettal yn ymmyd dy soilshaghyn-laue jeh keint erbee liorish shelgeyryn dy chretooryn-feie, conneeyn, ushagyn, ny beishtyn.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at Saint James’s Palace on the 31st day of May, 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Whaiyl ec y Plaase Noo Yamys er y nane jeig as feedoo laa jeh’n wheiggoo vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE HIGHWAYS ACT AMENDMENT ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS RAADYN MOOAREY (LHIASSAGHEY), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to continue in force the provisions of the Highways Act Amendment Act, 1905, and the Highways (Motor Car) Act, 1905, until the 5th July 1911.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy reayll ayns bree ny kiarailyn jeh’n Slattys Raadyn Mooarey (Lhiasaghey), Nuy cheead yeig as queig, as jeh’n Slattys Raadyn Mooarey (Motor Car), Nuy cheead yeig as queig, derrey yn queigoo laa jeh’n chiaghtoo vee, nuy cheead yeig as nane jeig.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at Saint James’s Palace on the 31st day of May, 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Whaiyl ec y Plaase Noo Yamys er y nane jeig as feedoo laa jeh’n wheiggoo vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE ARBBITRATION ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS FIR-OIK Y CHEE AS FEANISHYN (LEAGHAS FAILL), NUY CHEEAD AS JEIH

English: The object and purport of this Act are to provide for and regulate the submission of certain differences, and also the subject matter of legal proceedings, to arbitration.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo kiarail as oardaghyn son reyggyryn dy arganeyn as myrgeddin cooishyn-leigh dy ve reaghit fegooish leighderaght..

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at Saint James’s Palace on the 31st day of May, 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Whaiyl ec y Plaase Noo Yamys er y nane jeig as feedoo laa jeh’n wheiggoo vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE HIGHER EDUCATION (SCHOOL OF ART TRANSFER) ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS YNSAGH SYRJEY (DY YANNOO HARRISH YN SCHOILL SCHLEI), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to authorize the sale of the School of Art, Douglas, byt the trustees thereof, to the Higher Education Board of the Eastern District on the terms stated in the Act and scheduled agreement.
Manx: TA’N Slattys as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chur kied da ny Fir-hreishtee yn Schoill Schlei ec Doolish dy chreck eh da’n Voayrd Ynsagh Syrjey y Shliss Niar er ny conaantyn soit magh ayns y Slattys as y bargane rollit.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at Buckingham Palace on the 31st day of May, 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Whaiyl ec y Plaase Noo Yamys er y nane jeig as feedoo laa jeh’n wheiggoo vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE CIVIL REGISTRATION (MARRIAGES) ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS RECOYRTYSSYN THEAYAGH (POOSAGHYN), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to amend the law as to the registration of marriages, and it provides that all registers of baptisms, marriages, deaths, or burials containing entries prior to 1849 are to be deposited in Registry for Deeds.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn rish recortysyn poosey as ta kiarail dy bee currit ayns currym y Recortysser Barganeyn ooilley recortyssyn killagh, chammah lioaryn-vashtee, as lioayryn-poosee, as lioaryn-vaaish, ny oanluckee, ayndoo va ennym erbee scruit roish hoght cheead yeig nuy as daeed.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at            on the    day of          , 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec           ec            er y       laa jeh’n           vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE CHILDREN ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS PAITCHYN, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: The object and purport of this Act are to make further provision for the protection of, and for the prevention of cruelty to, children and young persons, and for the reformation and punishment of young and first offenders, and to consolidate the present law relating thereto.
Manx: TA’N aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy yannoo kiarail share son coadey paitchyn, as sleih aeg, as son lhiettal dewilys dy ve jeant orroo, as er yn oyr dy lhiasaghey as cherraghey kimmee aegey as adsyn ta son y chied keayrt ’sy chooyrt, as er yn oyr dy chruinnaghey yn leigh myr te bentyn rish shen.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at           on the      day of          , 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec           ec            er y       laa jeh’n           vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE BASTARDY ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS OAINJYRYS, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: THE object and purport of theis Act are to consolidate and amend the law as to bastardy.
Manx: TA’N aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy unnaneysey as lhiasaghey yn leih bentyn rish oainjyrys

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at           on the      day of          , 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec           ec            er y       laa jeh’n           vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE VILLA MARINA ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS OAINJYRYS, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: THE object and purport of this Act are to authorize the Douglas Corporation to purchase Villa Marina and No. 1, Marina Terrace, Douglas, from the trustees of the late H. B. Noble’s will, upon the terms and conditions of an agreement set out in the schedule to the Act. The Corporation are authorized to borrow money and do other things for carrying out the agreement, and to develop and manage Villa Marina.
Manx: TA’N aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy choyrt pooar gys y Co-Chorp Ghoolish dy chionnaghey Villa Marina as Terrace Marina, Earroo Nane, ayns Doolish, veih ny Fir-hreishtee fo hymney jeh Henry Bloom Noble rere ny conaantyn as ny coardailyn y bargane soit magh ayns rolley da’n Slattys. Ta pooar coyrt gys y Co-Chorp dy yeesaghey argid as dy yannoo reddyn elley son cur-lesh magh y bargane as dy vishaghey as ghurneil Villa Marina.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at           on the      day of          , 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec           ec            er y       laa jeh’n           vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE COMPANIES (CONSOLIDATION)  ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS SHESHAGHTYN (UNNANEYSAGH), NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: THE object and purport of this Act are to consolidate and extend the law relating to companies in the Isle of Man.
Manx: TA’N aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy unnaneysey as dy heeyney-magh yn leigh bentyn rish sheshaghtyn ayns Ellan Vannin.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at           on the      day of          , 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec           ec            er y       laa jeh’n           vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.

English: THE NOTIFICATION OF BIRTHS  ACT, 1910.
Manx: YN SLATTYS DY CHUR RAAUE JEH RUGGYRYN, NUY CHEEAD YEIG AS JEIH.

English: THE object and purport of this Act are to provide for the early notification of births.
Manx: TA’N aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail son cur raaue dy gerrid jeh ruggyryn.

English: The Royal assent to this Act was given by His Majesty in Council at the Court at           on the      day of          , 1910.
Manx: Va’n coardail Reeoil currit gys yn Slattys shoh liorish E Ard Ooashley ayns Coonceil ec y Quaiyl ec           ec            er y       laa jeh’n           vee, nuy cheead yeig as jeih.
